section.title: Refreshing Host Capabilities
section.para: When a network interface card is added to a host, the capabilities of the host must be refreshed to display that network interface card in the Manager.

step.para: Use the resource tabs, tree mode, or the search function to find and select a host in the results list.

section.para: The list of network interface cards in the Network Interfaces tab of the details pane for the selected host is updated. Any new network interface cards can now be used in the Manager.
